import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import Header from "../../shared/header/Header"; import Submenu from "../../layouts/submenu-layout/SubmenuLayout"; import "./SandW.scss"; const SandW = (props) => { return (

{props.name}

{props.days}

{props.lesson}

{props.module}

Speaking&Writing Modul # Lesson #

Recomendations

                Student should send a recording after completing at least ten
                lessons. Remember that you have to record all 3 parts of
                Speaking and: - use paragraphing - speak at least 2 min, but do
                not exceed 3 min in Speaking Part 2 - use synonyms (try to not
                repeat the same words) - use different grammatical structures
); }; export default SandW;
